Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at AKZENT Hotel Koerner Hof in Dortmund, you'll be convenient to Museum Ostwall and Marien Church. This hotel is within close proximity of St. Reinold's Church and Dortmund Concert Hall.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the guestrooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Rooms have private patios. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including a health club, an indoor pool, and a sauna. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge), shopping on site, and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of AKZENT Hotel Koerner Hof. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of AKZENT Hotel Koerner Hof. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at AKZENT Hotel Koerner Hof in Dortmund, you'll be convenient to Museum Ostwall and Marien Church. This hotel is within close proximity of St. Reinold's Church and Dortmund Concert Hall.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Museum Ostwall - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Marien Church - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
St. Reinold's Church - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Dortmund Concert Hall - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Orchestra Center NRW - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Hansaplatz - 2.7 km / 1.6 mi
Museum of Art and Cultural History - 2.7 km / 1.6 mi
Dortmund Brewery Museum - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Theater Dortmund - 2.8 km / 1.8 mi
Florian Tower - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Dortmund Opera House - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Steinwache Memorial and Museum - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Thier-Galerie - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
German Football Museum - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
German Cookbook Museum - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi

The preferred airport for AKZENT Hotel Koerner Hof is Dortmund (DTM) - 7.9 km / 4.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
